website_summaries.verdict: The best model for your many garden watering needs. You won't find an option on today's market that looks better or offers more.
pros: Beautiful color combo (green and copper), strong steel build, and 1-gallon capacity
Sprinkler head is removable when you need a powerful flow
cons: Copper accents are not real copper
Occasional reports of leakage around the sprinkler head

customer_reviews.title: "Copper Accents" are NOT copper "metal" (These areas are just spray painted with a copper color over steel)
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived badly scratched on the handles exposing the "SILVER" steel metal underneath (meaning that the "copper accents" are NOT "copper" metal, but merely "spray painted" with "copper paint finish" - which is a misleading product listing description)
customer_reviews.author: Maine-ah 🦞

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: The watering can is adorable. It does what it should. Very cheaply made. Less than a week of using it the spout is bent and the paint is flaking off. I wanted to communicate with the company before writing a review, but there was no link or option to do so. I’ve discarded the box and don’t want to pay shipping back. But I’m very disappointed in the quality. Not sure how it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I review all my items only after I have been able to use them as intended sometimes after having items for 6 months or longer. I do not review on shipping all my orders are sent to a FPO military address in Italy so shipping usually takes anywhere from 9-21days,but I can say all my orders do eventually arrive and sometimes the boxes are a bit abused but nothing inside has been damaged. Review:.. Very durable this was a great buy, been using for 6 months and it looks like I just took it out of the box. works just like a watering can should!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decided this great looking can was worth the splurge
customer_reviews.text: I debated about spending more than I needed to just to water my plants. Decided this great looking can was worth the splurge. I only got 1 full season out of it as it started leaking at the bottom the second summer. Too good looking to toss, I might use it as a prop around my garden, but as a watering can it failed miserably.
customer_reviews.author: Oracle

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this for a friend - she liked it quite a bit because it wasn't too heavy when full of water and also the spout came down low in the can so that you can pour all the water out without turning it upside down. I bought one for myself a couple of months ago and I really like it for those reasons and because the finish is a sturdy enamel and still looks good even though I abuse it and get it all dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Number 7 of 9

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the kind of watering can I wanted. It's not too heavy and it does a great job! I like the way you fill the water on top of the can ~ the other brands I tried had too small of openings on the tops or were filled at an angle. The dark green and copper makes the watering can pretty enough so I leave outside next to my small garden. Be sure to read the amount of water it holds before you order it since you may need a larger can if you have a big garden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller did not describe the product accurately.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from this seller, because they said it was returned due to a small ding. A ding I could live with, but nowhere in the ad did it begin to imply that the screw on floret dispenser was missing! Frustrating as heck! Not at all what I paid for or was expecting. I see this as a dishonest advertising practice.
customer_reviews.author: g.g. mom of 5, wife of 1, nya to 4

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watering can for a few months now and I use it everyday. It's a very sturdy piece that holds up to being filled to the brim. I have no issues with leakage from the spout, and I think the water disperses nicely keeping it from compacting my potting soil. So it functions perfectly, but its the loook that makes it stand out. I keep this on our covered porch as a statement piece because it is just that pretty. Guests never fail to mention how nice it looks .
customer_reviews.author: Jody Ricottone

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let it fall over!
customer_reviews.text: So, my watering can broke within the first week after receiving it. The watering can comes in two pieces, the can itself and the rounded tip. The up has a rubber gasket and easily slips right into its place on the can. My dog walked by the empty can and tipped it over. The tip of the cab broke clean off below the gasket. This wasn’t a hard drop or anything of the sort. The cab is cute and worked really well. So, I’m giving it two stars. If it hadn’t broken I would have rated this a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler head is missing
customer_reviews.text: Never would have bought this if it didn't have the sprinkler head. It came with the little pouch attached to the watering can that should have held the sprinkler head, but the pouch was open and nothing was inside. Amazon told me I cannot be mailed the spout, so now I have to put it back in the box and drive to UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this can a year ago and absolutely love it. It replaced my ugly plastic one on the front steps and has been sitting outside (over the winter) since the day it arrived. Still looks great. It did show up with a little ding on the side but i just straightened it out a bit. I actually did not expect the copper color to last but it still looks like new. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice size for watering small planters around the house inside or out
customer_reviews.text: So much more attractive than an average cam it looks wonderful just inside my front door and then I take it outside to take care of the flowers and little planters that park on sprinklers it really is a pretty piece highly recommend love it
customer_reviews.author: Constance Anne

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Watering Can!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watering can. It is easy to fill and easy to pour without spilling the water outside of the planter or pot. It also holds a lot of water and I don’t need to make as many trips as I used to. Overall, I am very happy I bought this. Thanks for reading and have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart Within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly manufactured product. The weld of the spout came apart within 2 days. This product is cute and it looks good online. However, it is not a product you would actually want to buy to use to water plants.
customer_reviews.author: D Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Construction
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't leave comments, good or bad, but my watering can was just delivered today and I was excited to try it and was disappointed that there is a large leak coming from where the spout meets the can! It's obviously not well built! Hopefully my husband can weld the can where it's leaking. I should give this 1 star but gave it a two ONLY bc it's very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Amza

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but leaks
customer_reviews.text: Nice to look at. Good sprinkler head. Leaks instantly, so be aware that you can't keep water in it or put it on top of anything you don't want wet. Cheap piece of crap, really, but functional for a quick sprinkle as long as you empty it before setting it anywhere except the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Terrils

customer_reviews.title: Handy size
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite individual and all of the watering cans I can find in my area are 2 gallon size, when filled, was a little heavy for my size and back issues. I have to make a couple more trips to fill the can but much easier for me to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Thought was galvanized plus painted but the inside rusted really bad along with the outside for being this price and galvanized and also painted should not rust, disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Needs to better packing for shipping
customer_reviews.text: Watering can showed up with one end of the copper strip at the bottom completely free (I'll have to retack it), and the top caved in 1/4" (I've manually bent it back). Not worth going through the return process since it's still usable (will be converting it to use as pond "fountain head"). The shipping box needs to be a lot sturdier. The air packs just kept it from rattling around in the box, they didn't offer any protection to the watering can. Since these watering cans are more decorative than functional I'd suggest taking a bit more care in the shipping dept.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Bates Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Came completely bent!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute and does what it’s supposed to but it came completely bent. The outside of the package was not damaged at all and neither were the other items in the same box so I’m thinking that they packed this item already bent.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: This can is a great size for medium sized decks or apartments
customer_reviews.text: This can is a great size for medium sized decks or apartments. I have no issues with the spout getting clogged, and the interior stays very clean. My only complaint is it can be hard to get a soft controlled pour out of it and will typically just dribble out when attempting to slow flow. Other than that, it's pretty great. A few months in, the copper coloring on the spout is turning a bit silver and rubbing off, but overall is maintaining its copper and green look and feel. If a strong wind blew it onto the train tracks and crushed it, I would probably buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton07

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I just love this watering can. It's a good size and the quality is nice. Still in good shape though it's usually outside. It's great for watering my small container garden. I really like the color too. The rain shower head attachment is good also. The handles make it very comfortable to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Useful and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This watering can is extremely attractive. For smaller people like myself, the gallon is enough to be able to lug across a yard without a problem. We've had the watering can since the holidays and the only problem was the tip of the spout where the sealant came off. It still works perfectly. Id' highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter Reader

customer_reviews.title: Well made and charming.
customer_reviews.text: A well made and even stylish (if you like to show off) watering can. We live in a nice condo with planters, so this gets exposed to elements and to views. It is very charming. In fact, when we went to Austin TX to visit our son, we saw that his wife had purchased the same Gardman waterer in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Missing sprinkler head
customer_reviews.text: This arrived without a sprinkler head. Just a straight pipe with a threaded end. The can was also much smaller than I had expected, which is my fault for not reading the description more carefully. I returned the item for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heisey

customer_reviews.title: Superb watering can
customer_reviews.text: Cant find these babies anywhere. Just like grandma's watering can. I love it, it also serves as a decor piece when not being used. A must buy, but is a bit high in price due to galvanized steel material
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Green Galvanized Watering Can
customer_reviews.text: I have one planter sitting on our small porch. I bought this can because it was the perfect size for the planter. I decided I like using it without the spout which twists off. This is actually a really cute watering can so I have also left it on the porch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie CollinsTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter in law. They have just purchased their first home which has lovely room for a garden and she was super excited
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, but....
customer_reviews.text: I liked the looks of it, but when I received it, I got it with the head broken off of it, and I could see there is already rust under the green paint around where the head attaches. The "copper" is not really copper, but just painted on. I don't know how long it will last, considering I received it with something already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Corndog

customer_reviews.title: Better for looks than for function
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold as much water as I would have hoped. Seems very old school and nostalgic but as far as functional I would say it falls a bit short of larger plastic ones. There are definitely better solutions out there but the build quality and paint in it are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Keon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor quality control IMO
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this only two stars because the sprinkle head that screws into the spout was missing. I noticed others had mentioned that also. There was a small bubble baggy attached to the handle that should have had the sprinkle head in it, but it was empty!! The head was not in the packing box, nor had it fallen into the can itself. Pretty poor quality control IMO!!
customer_reviews.author: JulieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Copper color comes off
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 3 years now...it has held up well structurally except for the fact that the copper accent portions are clearly painted on and faded/scratched off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: This watering can is very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Updating after 3 months - the pretty copper paint has started to scratch off a bit on the diffuser portion, revealing the steel underneath. I'm changing my review from 5 to 4 stars - hoping that the paint doesn't continue to scratch off. ---- This watering can is very pretty and very functional. I use it to water plants on my balcony and keep it inside as decor on top of my media center. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: missing part
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described. I am very pleased over all. It's not too heavy. Except for one very important thing. The removable rosette-diffuser (the sprinkler head) is missing. There is also a plastic package attached to the watering can handle that looked like it contained information, which was missing. Is there any way that I can get the sprinkler head???? I don't need a new watering can, just the diffuser. Please??
customer_reviews.author: ladybluerb

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with spout
customer_reviews.text: This watering can is great. Sturdy, good size and material. It was delivered without the spout ... That's a big bummer for me since I got it specifically for that spout, but I might be able to make use of it anyway. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hart

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE PRODUCT THAT WAS ADVERTISED!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When received water can, the Copper handles are both showing wear from being used. The copper is warn off from hands and have scratches on side handle. The spout didn't have the copper shower head on it at all, completely missing. Very disappointed in product... Not at all what the picture showed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My bad
customer_reviews.text: I previously wrote that I received a second one without the diffuser cap included. I have to retract that review as upon further inspection I've found it dangling from the handle. Sorry! I expected it to be attached. So far, without actually using it, it looks to be just fine. Will update once I've had the chance to actually try it out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It is missing the chrome diffuser spout so water just pours out of the end.will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Proud to leave it out.
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. Looks great left out in the garden. It is the perfect size for me, but it is just a gallon. I suppose the o-ring between the sprinkler head and the tube may weather, but that is a couple cent piece of maintenance. I love using this watering can.
customer_reviews.author: rfw

customer_reviews.title: Greenlit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this buy. I know it’s not the cheapest product around BUT it’s very good quality and looks really pretty. You can also take off the front which is very practical as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I'm already in love with it! However, I believe I received a damaged product. It is severely dented on the handle side.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieD

customer_reviews.title: A welcome addition to my yard!
customer_reviews.text: I am the proud owner of an utterly brilliant watering can. I searched for some time (it reminds me of what my granddad used back in the days). It’s not excessively huge but it does the job. With one full lid I’m able to water 6 potted trees and all my seedlings without soil disruption! I’d buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cute landscape addition!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely watering can, I used it to plant flowers in for the front porch. the watering head did not arrive with the can and I failed to contact seller for correction, but I love it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic.
customer_reviews.text: They are certainly good at watering the plants, and they also look Authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both Beautiful and Functional - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: As shown with the ratings, very very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how the water comes out the spout. Super neat and great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamika Alghwaizy

customer_reviews.title: Could be better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because the description said it was copper it’s not. The nozzle part it’s not copper at all but paint. After using it 3 times the paint came off
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Nice can but came defective.
customer_reviews.text: Came missing front “sprinkler” head. But Amazon replaced it right away and is great and decorative. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ssaccess

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy watering can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I use it daily and waters the plants well with control of flow. I require filling it twice for my small patio. Compared to the hose, this is easy to carry and so far hasn't fallen apart outside. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watering can. Looks good on the patio when not in use. Love the fact you can remove the spray nozzle for a steady stream.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for watering small plants in my front yard. Made well, will last for years
customer_reviews.author: Heather Day

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassed and Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t done a lot of online shopping but I found this lovely water car was exactly what I wanted for a special “hard the buy for “ friend for Christmas. It arrived on time for me to wrap it and give it as an early Christmas present. When it arrived, unfortunately, it was damaged with a dent at the side near the top of the can. It was to late to send it back. So I had to give it to her damage. Embarrassed and Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Langford

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but the copper fades/chips easily.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and ergonomic. Beats the heck out of the gallon milk jug I was using before. The "copper accents" wear off quickly though. I've used it daily for about a month now and the copper color is faded where my hand touches the handles and the copper is chipped around the spout. Still cute and functional, though.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t clean in hot water
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this watering can. Super cute and a good size for my small patio. BUT do not try washing it in hot water. I ruined the outside paint job when I did. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watering can! ImPacking was a bit open when i got it but that’s okay still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Rusted inside in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This great-looking watering can does not live up to the "galvanized to prevent rust" info. Where the spout meets the body of the can, it has severely rusted, and you can see rust in the water.
customer_reviews.author: gaelicgal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watering can. It’s nice to look at, unlike those hideous plastic ones that are sold everywhere. It’s classy looking and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Water can arrived missing the spout attachment shown in the picture to disperse water. Update box was damaged - found spout on steps thank you
customer_reviews.author: sista

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged with spots on the copper areas . I don’t believe it was used I think more of poor manufacturing of product. Was going to give a gift good thing I looked first will be returning. Added pictures t
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool look. Works like a charm. Love that you can take off the sprinkler head for use with small pots.
customer_reviews.author: Jody C.

customer_reviews.title: Rustic Cutie
customer_reviews.text: The color is so cute! It matches my cabin perfect and rustic looking
customer_reviews.author: cindiblu

customer_reviews.title: Can Leaks Eventually
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this can three months ago. It worked well until I began storing water in it a month ago. Now it has a small leak at the bottom seam. Very disappointed. It still works well otherwise, but now I have to purchase sealant for the leak.
customer_reviews.author: E. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: I Lucked Out
customer_reviews.text: Mine's perfect and doesn't leak. I've read some of these leak and I know someone who got a leaky one. Very nice looking watering can.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Beach area approved
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for about two months. I live near the beach so it's important that this item doesn't rust. No signs so far. Win! Also, I keep my watering can out in the open so because it's so nice, it's not an eye sore. Excellent quality and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Its just as pictured and im in love with it!!😍
customer_reviews.author: kalani

customer_reviews.title: Descent
customer_reviews.text: The pot looks and feels hand made. The copper colored Spout however quickly peeled off and is now just shiny silver.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler weaver

customer_reviews.title: Well Made! Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkler can is just what I needed! It gives forth a gentle "rain" of water. Can is about the size of a large coffee can.
customer_reviews.author: W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife to water her flowers. She liked it so Much it became a flower vase
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A fancy can
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid watering can. It is nice enough to hang in the kitchen as an accent piece.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Paul

customer_reviews.title: THE VERY BEST IN QUALITY AND LOOKS.  A true keeper. Your gardening friends will love you for getting them one.
customer_reviews.text: Substantial weight. Wonderful form, color and function. Superior quality for the price. Intend to buy others as pretty gifts for my gardening friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Functional and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it work it looks great next to my potted plants. I'm thinking of getting another one to add to my patio garden.
customer_reviews.author: Ila W. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is beautiful and what I expected and good and sturdy, I expect it will be a long time before I will ever have to buy another. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cameron

customer_reviews.title: I THINK IT IS GREAT! BEST WATERING CAN I HAVE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: I THINK IT IS GREAT! BEST WATERING CAN I HAVE EVER HAD! AND IT LOOKS GREAT SITTING ON MY PATIO. THE CAN IS BALANCED AND HAS A LARGE OPENING MAKING IT EASY TO FILL WITH WATER.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie

customer_reviews.title: Small but durable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side but looks great and smaller means that it doesn’t get too heavy when full of water
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Far from expectation and description
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but the paint was poorly done and water doesn t come out smoothly. Tend to spill large amount.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Cute but leaks around the copper shower head top. Very hard to neatly water plants - water goes everywhere - it streams from the bottom of the head while projecting forward from the shower head portion.
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for watering my plants and I love the looks also
customer_reviews.author: steve long

customer_reviews.title: Nice watering can
customer_reviews.text: Cute and classy. Bought as a gift for my mom. I like the o-ring on the spout attachment. Should keep it from leaking at that point. Good finish but there was a small dent along the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watering can
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the can as gift, nice can, however the cooper accent water spout was missing from the can / box.
customer_reviews.author: SEA

customer_reviews.title: Works Well & Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my apartment balcony plants. Spout screws off for a single stream and easily screws back on for spread pouring. I also love the color combination.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Size smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The size is a little smaller than I expected, so I cannot really use it for my outdoor garden. But this is still a very good product. So far no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Used- Very good... not so much
customer_reviews.text: Bought Used for $5 less with Very a good description...it has two dents, and scratches on the handles and water spout. It works but honestly I’d rather spend the extra 5 for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Hart

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the plastic ones. Best part is the huge opening at top for filing. Well made and awesome colors. 2 handles make it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm so enamored with this watering can! Functional and decorative, it is just great quality. I keep it right on my front porch and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great watering can
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watering can. We love that there is a detachable spout. It looks wonderful. We are a little bit upset about the girth of the top handle, because it won't fit into any of the I-hooks I have in my garden, but I guess that's probably a review that I should write for the I-hooks. VERY stylish green.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B Easton

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at and easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: Lovely to look at and easy to manage. Wish I had a bigger one, however, to cut down on the trips to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers have experienced, this item leaked from the very first time I filled it with water.
customer_reviews.author: timshel

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Horrible weld or glue job for the spout and the sprinkler head wasn't even with it
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & functional.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute watering can. I’ve had it for a long time now. It’s the cutest one I’ve ever seen. I like to leave it sitting under my dripping faucet outside & use the water to fill my porch plants.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, will only stay that way if you treat it with kid gloves.
customer_reviews.text: The "copper" handle scratches easily, and there's already rust showing on the back of the spout. Urgh. Such a pretty can in person, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kangourou

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: The cooper finish peeled off within the first week of having it, and the spout gets clogged often (granted the trees here are raining seeds and leaves). It does the job decent enough. It's good but by no means great.
customer_reviews.author: Contimo P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have been watering my plants with it for several months now and it has been the greatest thing. It is truly beautiful and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but small
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, but somewhat pricey for the size. It would be great if it was 2 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: WAR

customer_reviews.title: Using out in my garden.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and Cute Little Water Container. Container was damaged when I received it, probably not enough cushioning. Box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pete

customer_reviews.title: PAINTED copper accents
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking over all but copper "accents" PAINT on handle made me realize the only true copper was the sprinkler head. Still, nice overall. Wished got the 1.9 gallon size though
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift. Arrived in perfect condition, with all parts in tact. I've seen nicer watering cans, but for what I paid (27.00) this turned out to be fine. It even got oooohs at the party, so it is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The copper coating is already coming off (see photos) and I just took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: MissPanache59

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! A bit small for garden use
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! A bit small for garden use, but wonderful for decoration and flower arrangements.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: A watering can that waters
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a Mother's Day gift with a hammock that she had been wanting. It is very pretty, for a watering can, and waters like a watering can should. I know, very deep thoughts about my watering can right?!
customer_reviews.author: Cromagnum Man

customer_reviews.title: Missing Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: The water can arrived and looks great, but the diffuser on top the spout was missing. There was also no way to contact the seller. I decided to keep rather than send back, but be aware........
customer_reviews.author: Dan C. Larsen

product_meta.title: Gardman 8327 Hunter Green Galvanized Steel Watering Can with Copper Accents, 1-Gallon
product_meta.description: This striking design combines a sturdy galvanized steel body with copper colored accents (please note that product is 100% stainless steel and that the copper portions are colored accents) on both handles, rosette cap, and bottom band to create a decorative and highly functional watering can. Attractive, durable “hunter green” powder-coated finish on main body. Heavy duty galvanized steel construction for long life and rust resistance. Threaded removable rosette-diffuser creates a gentle shower of water to leave mulch and soil undisturbed; perfect for young seedlings. Angled neck spout reaches well inside your foliage. Each can is quality-checked for leakage before leaving our factory. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. Easy-to-fill one-gallon capacity. Dimensions: 12” Long x 7.25” Wide x 17” High. **Also available in a shiny galvanized version Gardman Model # 8326 (sold separately). Gardman "Bring your garden to life"
feature_bullets: Robust design with striking "copper colored" accents
Outdoor pathways, illuminating beds,borders, ponds and garden features
Removable rosette-diffuser creates a gentle shower of water
The spout is attached with a small zip tie to the watering can

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
